CustomField.description: If a Lead is created with this field being "true" or is updated to this field being "true", it will trigger the campaign flow and create a matching campaign member, based on Related Event ID
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a Lead is created with this field being "true" or is updated to this field being "true", it will trigger the campaign flow and create a matching campaign member, based on Related Event ID
CustomField.label: Campaign Flow Trigger
